00027 #ifndef __INPUT_SERVICE_H__
00028 #define __INPUT_SERVICE_H__
00029 
00030 #include "osystem.h"
00031 
00032 namespace omega
00033 {
00035         // Forward declarations
00036         struct Event;
00037         class ServiceManager;
00038 
00040         class OMEGA_API Service: public DynamicObject
00041         {
00042         friend class ServiceManager;
00043         public:
00044                 enum ServiceType { Pointer, Mocap, Keyboard, Controller }; 
00045                 enum ServicePollPriority { PollFirst, PollNormal, PollLast }; 
00046 
00047         public:
00048                 // Class constructor
00049                 Service(): myManager(NULL), myPriority(PollNormal) {}
00050 
00051            // Class destructor
00052                 virtual ~Service() {}
00053 
00054                 ServiceManager* getManager();
00055                 String getName();
00056 
00057                 ServicePollPriority getPollPriority();
00058                 void setPollPriority(ServicePollPriority value);
00059 
00060                 virtual void setup(Setting& settings) {}
00061                 virtual void initialize() {}
00062                 virtual void start() {}
00063                 virtual void poll() {}
00064                 virtual void stop() {}
00065                 virtual void dispose() {}
00066 
00067         protected:
00068                 void lockEvents();
00069                 void unlockEvents();
00070                 Event* writeHead();
00071                 Event* readHead();
00072                 Event* readTail();
00073                 Event* getEvent(int index);
00074                 bool bLeftHandedSystem;
00075                 void setLeftHandedSystem(bool leftHanded);
00076 
00077         private:
00078                 void doSetup(Setting& settings);
00079                 void setManager(ServiceManager* mng) { myManager = mng; }
00080 
00081         private:
00082                 ServiceManager* myManager;
00083                 String myName;
00084                 ServicePollPriority myPriority;
00085         };
00086 
00088         inline ServiceManager* Service::getManager() 
00089         { return myManager; }
00090 
00092         inline String Service::getName() 
00093         { return myName; }
00094 
00096         inline Service::ServicePollPriority Service::getPollPriority()
00097         { return myPriority; }
00098 
00100         inline void Service::setPollPriority(Service::ServicePollPriority value)
00101         { myPriority = value; }
00102 }; // namespace omega
